title: 06/16/2021 - HOUR 1 - Kevin Durant's Career Performance, Kawhi Leonard and Nick Wright
itunes:title: 06/16/2021 - HOUR 1 - Kevin Durant's Career Performance, Kawhi Leonard and Nick Wright
description:
In hour 1, Colin recaps Kevin Durants game 5 performace, calling him an "Offensive Expert". Kawhi Leonard being out for game 5 and Nick Wright joins to talk NBA Playoffs and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
